title: REDWOOD CITY-EXECUTIVEhome w/beautiful finishes, bright and open floor
posting_body: REDWOOD CITY - EXECUTIVE home with beautiful finishes, bright and open floor plan.
Address: 3509 Page St, Redwood City, ca 94063
Rooms: 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, separate family room and a living room,1 story, 2 car attached garage with automatic opener
Details: Beautifully remodeled home with highest quality designer finishes.
Open floor plan with oak hardwood floors throughout the house.
Remodeled kitchen has granite counter tops, major brand stainless steel appliances such as double oven, gas stove and refrigerator (all included).
Kitchen with large island and dining area is naturally lit by expansive skylight.
Spacious living room with stone fireplace wall, step down family room opens to manicured back yard patio.
Attractively remodeled bathrooms with pebble floors.
Master bedroom with spacious walk-in closet, a second closet, and ensuit large bathroom.

Desirable location in the heart of Silicon Valley offering proximity to major tech companies such as FB Headquarters (2.5 miles), Box,  1 mile to Stanford Medical Center ( 1 miles), Downtown Redwood City cafes and Stanford with convenient access to Hwy 101.
Full size washer and dryer included.
** DO NOT DISTURB OCCUPANTS - PLEASE EMAIL FOR A PRIVATE APPOINTMENT ***
For APPLICATIONS and OTHER AVAILABLE PROPERTIES please visit WWW.CMPMI.COM ***
Elizabeth (Liz) Santos, Assistant Property Manager for:
Andrea Vernerova, Broker Associate, Property Manager, Cal DRE #01470436
